title: "My laptop blue screens every time it sleeps idk why," he says nonchalantly
body:
######Let's say I'm Zilean because I know my shit and he's Fizz because he's fuckin retarded
{{champion:26}} Well do you have any antivirus?
{{champion:105}} No. All antiviruses _are_ viruses.
{{champion:26}} What the f---
{{champion:105}} Microsoft security essentials is the only real antivirus.
{{champion:26}} Well Comodo is a really good Security Suite that lets you---
{{champion:105}} I don't trust it.
{{champion:26}} At least get Avast. You can't go wrong with Av--
{{champion:105}} I'm good.

#I HOPE TO GOD HE ISN'T APPLYING FOR COLLEGES WITH THAT LAPTOP. GOODBYE TO HIS IDENTITY IF HE IS.
